body_html:
@neerajprad build scripts are in repo:

https://github.com/pytorch/builder/tree/master/conda - both
https://github.com/pytorch/builder/tree/master/manywheel - wheel Linux
https://github.com/pytorch/builder/tree/master/wheel - wheel OSX

I will provide a script for CPU-only builds and have CPU-only binaries soon

body:
@neerajprad build scripts are in repo:

https://github.com/pytorch/builder/tree/master/conda - both
https://github.com/pytorch/builder/tree/master/manywheel - wheel Linux
https://github.com/pytorch/builder/tree/master/wheel - wheel OSX

I will provide a script for CPU-only builds and have CPU-only binaries soon
